example_comment: is the consonat / vowel pharyngealized or is it just a phoneme?

value1_name: Presence of the numeral marker in the numeral ‘1’
feature: Presence of the numeral marker in the numeral ‘1’
comment: In the substantivized form in numerals 1, 2, 3, and 5 the glottal stop is added after the root (all of which end with vowels). Root '4' ends with the glottal stop in all positions, it is a part of the root.
